titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Thomas H. (Thomas Hawkins) Johnson Papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Processed by Aparna Mukherjee

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-02-06T11:31-0800

change.item: 2018 January 31: Added links to materials from the 2018 release of declassified records series that are available on digitalcollections.hoover.org. -Sally DeBauche

did.unittitle: Thomas H. (Thomas Hawkins) Johnson Papers

physdesc.extent: 52 manuscript boxes, 1 motion picture film reel

did.abstract: Writings, correspondence, notes, memoranda, studies, technical reports, journal articles, and other printed matter, relating to physics, nuclear and other energy sources, nuclear weapons, laser technology, the Strategic Defense Initiative, arms control, and scientific policy in the United States during the presidential administration of Ronald Reagan. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Thomas Hawkins Johnson Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1992.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Graduated from U.S. Military Academy, West Point, and commissioned as a second lieutenant
MS in Physics, University of California, Davis
PhD in Applied Physics, University of California, Davis
Chief, physics section, Weapons Laboratory, Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico
Permanent professor, U.S. Military Academy, West Point, New York
Returned to U.S. Military Academy, West Point, New York, and taught in Department of English
Director, Science Research Laboratory, U.S. Military Academy, West Point, New York
Deputy to the president's science advisor and deputy director, White House Office of Science and Technology Policy
Executive director, White House Science Council
Associate Dean, academic research, U.S. Military Academy, West Point, New York

eventgrp.event: Member, International Board of Editors, Science and Global Security

chronitem.event: Poems, Sewanee Review. Posthumously published and dedicated to his memory

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Acquired in 1992, the Thomas Hawkins Johnson papers consist of correspondence, journal articles, memoranda, notes, studies, technical reports, writings and other printed matter, relating to physics, nuclear and other energy sources, nuclear weapons, laser technology, the Strategic Defense Initiative, arms control, and scientific policy in the United States during the presidential administration of Ronald Reagan.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.
